key.name: Temple of Immortals
key.uiDescription:
The immortal $npcName:23090005$ cannot be destroyed, but he can be contained for a time. On the edge of $map:02000200$, at the $map:02000037$, a hero must rise to combat the undying $npc:23090005$!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font>

key.name: Last of the Vayar
key.uiDescription: The ancients took the holy Vayar Mountain as their sanctuary and planted the stones of faith there, giving rise to the giant golems that would protect the sacred area. With their civilization in ruins, most of the Vayar have gone into hiding... but one has returned, at Bastei Peak.

key.name: Last of the Vayar

With their civilization in ruins, most of the Vayar have gone into hiding... but one has returned, at Bastei Peak.

key.name: Blueshade Cave
key.uiDescription: The warm-hearted Shoo from Snowfield took a poison arrow right to the heart, and froze their ticker with an ice fragment until they could get help. This had the unfortunate side effect of turning Shoo into a ravenous monster who has been wreaking havoc with their friend Booboo.

key.name: Blueshade Cave
key.uiDescription: The warm-hearted Shoo from Snowfield took a poison arrow right to the heart, and froze their ticker with an ice fragment until they could get help. This had the unfortunate side effect of turning Shoo into a ravenous monster who has been wreaking havoc with their friend Booboo.

key.name: Warbot Rebellion
key.uiDescription: The MK 52 series of war robots was designed in secret by the brilliant Dr. Kartronic for unknown purposes. Surely his intentions were good, but now they appear to have gotten out of hand. Watch out for the Beta version, for its combat potential is significantly higher than that of the Alpha.

key.name: Horus's Nest
key.uiDescription: Once long ago, the top of $map:02000009$ was a grand forest. It was here that Horus made a nest... and here Horus plotted revenge against humans hunting eggs. Now the forest is thinned, and the nest is exposed. Who will take the fight to Horus?

key.name: Horus's Nest

key.name: Forgotten Vayar
key.uiDescription: The ancient civilization of the holy Vayar Mountains is no more, but their legacy can be found in the strangest places. Such as in an icy cave on a secluded beach... That is where the terrible $npcName:23000006$ has awakened.

key.name: Forgotten Vayar

key.name: Forest of Chaos
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000025$ sows chaos to pave the way for his dark masters. This beast is the source of a potent curse that grips this once-peaceful forest.

key.name: Forest of Chaos
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000025$ sows chaos to pave the way for his dark masters. This beast is the source of a potent curse that grips this once-peaceful forest.

key.name: Demon Tree
key.uiDescription:
A dormant demon tree has begun controlling villagers, forcing them to worship statues the tree has imbued with pure evil. If this is allowed to continue, such evil will eventually conquer all of humanity.
<font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot instant revive if you have Soul's Respite.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• You cannot use Mesos to instant revive.</font> <font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Shadow Altar
key.uiDescription:
The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Normal Shadow Altar
key.uiDescription: The $map:02000213$ is the base of the mighty $npcName:23000007$, who uses it to bring his army into Maple World. Any who would challenge $npcName:23000007$ must survive his corrupting darkness. • You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. • Safe revivals are limited in this challenge. • Reward limit is shared with the $dungeonTitle:23006003$ dungeon. • A 6-member party is recommended for this dungeon. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon, Top, Bottoms Lv. 50 Epics +11 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 50 Epics Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 50 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score. However, this dungeon is extremely challenging! You may need a higher gear score and lots of practice in order to clear it.

key.uiDescription: The most powerful of Dr. Kartronic's war robots was considered a failure because it could not be controlled. No one knows when $npcName:23000056$ will finally escape their prison in $map:02000232$ and destroy everything.

key.name: Moonlight Fortress
key.uiDescription: For ages, boats have occasionally gone missing in the middle of the ocean. They leave no remains, either, adding to the mystery. Somewhere out there, a phantom pirate ship stalks the waves. What could they be doing out there?

key.name: Hemokan the Fallen
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23000039$ has awakened from its transformation within the Shadow Seeds sowed by corrupted fairies. As the vile energies gather, $npcName:23000039$ grows stronger and more enraged. Who will be the one to face the beast and lay it to rest? Protect $map:02000023$ from the savage $npc:23000039$!

key.name: Burning Pamokan
key.uiDescription: Strange fires have been sparked all over Victoria Island, and their source appears to be $map:02000079$! The harbinger of flames, $npcName:23000041$, has emerged from the lava and returned to terrorize the populace. Can you drive back $npcName:23000041$ and stop the spreading flames?

key.uiDescription:
The dark fairfolk have driven $npcName:23100011$ mad, and he's torching everything in sight. Who will face the flames of $map:02000311$ and end the menace?

key.name: Waterbug Park
key.uiDescription: Due to the outrageous insect infestation, $map:02010019$ has been closed to the public. According to $npcName:11001342$, the ones that appeared with the insect captain were acting like soldiers searching for something... For now, sweep out the insects so $map:02010019$ can reopen for business!

key.name: Lubelisk
key.uiDescription:
Lubelisk, the shrine of the fallen Merjit kingdom, exudes a powerful darkness. What could Varrekant, a visitor from the other world, want from there? Recover the stolen Lumenstone and defeat Varrekant!
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Rune Temple
key.uiDescription:
Deep within this divine sanctuary, the Rune Shamans hid a magic weapon of untold power, the Runicta. Its guardian sits beside it in an enchanted sleep, awaiting a disciple of the runic arts capable of wielding the weapon's incredible power. Will you awaken the ancient titan?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.uiDescription:

key.name: The Song of the Oracle
key.uiDescription:
The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Icethorn Ridge
key.uiDescription:
It is said that somewhere at the foot of $map:02000381$, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path only appears to a few, and when it does, an icy wail travels along it, frightening away any who might dare enter. Who or what could be hiding within?
<font color='#00aaef'>• Safe revivals are limited in this challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Cusp of Life
key.uiDescription: The great barrier of life that maintains order in the mortal world is under siege. Someone seeks to claim the Green Lapenta of Life, and is willing to destroy the barrier entirely to do it. Fight to protect the source of all life!

key.name: The Poison Cave
key.uiDescription: The naturally-occurring poisons of the Land of Darkness are spilling over into Maple World! This isn't an accident... someone is trying to poison the whole world. They're trying to stay out of sight, but an intrepid hero might be able to track them down.

key.name: Palace Undercroft
key.uiDescription: Within the dark halls beneath Tria Palace, a piercing scream rings out. What awaits you in the Palace Undercroft?

key.name: Palace Undercroft

key.name: Cherry Blossom Forest
key.uiDescription: The beautiful Cherry Blossom Forest is home of the boroboros, or fairfolk dwarves. Over the years, they've grown more and more reclusive, until at last they were forgotten. Now, a cry for help can be heard from these mysterious reaches. What could have happened to them?

key.uiDescription: There's a legend in the Land of Darkness about the seed of darkness, an object which can birth new descendants of the demon king! Once the seed sprouts and the roots are set, it is said that darkness will engulf the world...

key.name: Casa de Luna
key.uiDescription: Once the moon lost its light, an unknown shadow fell over $map:02010047$. Taking advantage of the darkness, an ancient shaman has plotted to grow his power and threaten the world!

key.name: Coldwind Cave
key.uiDescription: The waterway that crosses the village starts underground. The villagers give offerings to the underground tunnel creature, out of fear that the waterway will be shut off. Who could do such a thing?

key.name: Blaknov No. 1
key.uiDescription: An unruly mob has seized Blackstar's main transportation, the Blaknov! $npcName:11001460$'s suborindate $npcName:11003124$ is trapped on the train and needs to be rescued. Why was the Blaknov taken in the first place? Stop the runaway train and find out!

key.name: Lingering Darkness
key.uiDescription: You thought it was over. You thought his treachery and evil had been ended. But the seed of darkness in his heart would not let him rest. When will this darkness truly end?

key.name: Sanctum of the Sage
key.uiDescription: The villainous $npcName:11001778$ is after the Animus Lamp, the artifact of a secret order of martial artist beastfolk. Join $npcName:24002718$ and $npcName:24002719$ as they fight to expel evil from their order's sanctum and restore light to the darkness.

key.name: Sanctum of the Sage
key.uiDescription: The villainous $npcName:11001778$ is after the Animus Lamp, the artifact of a secret order of martial artist beastfolk. Join $npcName:24002718$ and $npcName:24002719$ as they fight to expel evil from their order's sanctum and restore light to the darkness.

key.name: Muros Studio
key.uiDescription: It's the first day of filming, but the big star is nowhere to be found! Time is short, and the director is desparate to find a replacement actor. This is your chance to make your TV debut, and take a shot at stardom! Will you step into the spotlight?

key.name: Muros Studio
key.uiDescription: It's the first day of filming, but the big star is nowhere to be found! Time is short, and the director is desparate to find a replacement actor. This is your chance to make your TV debut, and take a shot at stardom! Will you step into the spotlight?

key.name: Guardian of the Seas
key.uiDescription: The reclusive guardian's call reverberates from the depths of the ocean. Seized by a dark rage, he bellows in warning. What exactly is he trying to tell the humans above?

key.name: The Song of the Oracle
key.uiDescription: The siren sisters who dwell upon $map:02000391$ are said to be as beautiful as their song. But the sudden influx of unwelcome guests has filled them with rage. Placate them and learn what they know of the message coming from the ocean.

key.name: Madrakan's Heart
key.uiDescription: A small crack can grow and eventually lead to the downfall of an impenetrable fortress. The Maple Alliance has put together an elite team to invade Madrakan. It's time to end one of the greatest threats to the Maple Alliance!

key.name: Madrakan Ramparts
key.uiDescription: The siege of Madrakan, the stronghold of Madria, has begun! The Maple Alliance has it surrounded, but its thick castle walls are preventing entry. The only way to conquer Madrakan now is to somehow storm the gateway—a task for a true hero!

key.name: Chateau of Grief
key.uiDescription: A huge manor has been discovered at one corner of the Shadow Gate. It's deserted, but there's a malicious aura all around it. What happened in there, so long ago?

key.name: Icethorn Ridge
key.uiDescription: It is said that at the foot of a mountain, hidden within a raging snowstorm, a secret path to a lost kingdom awaits. The path appears to precious few, and those who see it are frightened away by a terrifying cry. Who or what could be hiding there?

key.name: Normal Frostpillar Temple
key.uiDescription:
A temple to a lost kingdom. A dark shadow that stands watch. No adventurer has ever survived long enough to uncover the temple's secrets...

key.uiDescription: A special area for premium club members only! Here you can change into your desired character and break as many statues as you can within the time limit to earn large sums of money.

key.name: Cathy Mart Part-Time Job
key.uiDescription: $npc:11001985$ has a thriving business and is ready to expand! She's recruiting staff for her newly opened express mart. Can you survive the fast-paced low-pay life of an order fulfillment center worker? Gather up a 4-member party and find out!

key.name: Abandoned Mine B1
key.uiDescription:
Rare and precious treasure is hidden in the abandoned mine. Can you find your way through the labyrinthine mine, avoiding the hidden monsters and dangerous traps to find the treasure?

key.uiDescription:
Can you overcome Papulatus, the master of time? Conquer him and you can obtain an item that exists between past and future. Take up the paradox of Papulatus before the rift of Ludibrium closes.
<font color='#FFD400'>• Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge.</font> <font color='#FFD400'>• A 4-member party is recommended for this dungeon.</font>

key.name: Hard Ancient Aetherine Mine
key.uiDescription: $npcName:23400072$ lives! Only you stand between this self-proclaimed god and the destruction of everything you hold dear. Will you take a stand to save Kritias... and the world? • You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. • Match your attacks to the element icon over each of Zakum's arms. • Safe revivals are limited in this challenge. • You cannot use Mesos to instant revive. • Reward limit is shared with the $dungeonTitle:23041003$ dungeon. • A 10-member party is recommended for this dungeon. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Weapon, Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +13 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Epics +13 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score. However, this dungeon is extremely challenging! You may need a higher gear score and lots of practice in order to clear it.

key.name: Queen Bean Arena
key.uiDescription: $npcName:11004285$, queen of the Pink Beans, has descended upon Maple World! The $npcName:11004285$ Rumble is a tournament between Maple World's craziest heroes. Can you bring a little excitement to Her Majesty's humdrum life? Clear Condition: Clear Round 1 or higher The challenge ends automatically when your health reaches 0. You must equip the standard weapon type for your job to enter. Your reward is based on how many rounds you cleared. You can't advance to the next round if you don't meet its gear score requirement. Your ranking is recorded after you select 'Start Over.' • Higher level heroes have their attributes scaled down so that monsters are still a challenge. ★ Gear Score Tips ★ Rounds 1-3: 19400 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +13 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Epics +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 4-7: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Epics +14 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics Rounds 8-10: 24000 Weapon Lv. 70 Legendaries +11 Top, Bottoms Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Headgear, Gloves, Shoes Lv. 70 Legendaries +10 Earrings, Cape, Necklace, Ring, Belt Lv. 70 Epics The above suggestions will get you to the minimum gear score.
